meanings.definition: A small building used for storing tools.
meanings.sent1: My dad keeps all his hammers and screwdrivers in the toolsheds.
meanings.sent2: The toolsheds in the backyard are painted red and white.
meanings.sent3: When the toolsheds heard about the new lawnmower, they were thrilled!
meanings.sent4: The toolsheds stood like guardians, protecting the precious tools inside.
meanings.sent5: The toolsheds smelled of fresh wood and oil, a comforting scent for any handyman.

meanings.definition: The act of storing tools in a shed.
meanings.sent1: Toolsheds require organization to keep all the tools in place.
meanings.sent2: After a long day of work, the toolsheds welcomed the returning tools.
meanings.sent3: The toolsheds decided to go on strike until they were properly cleaned and organized.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a toolshed of memories, neatly stored and ready to be accessed.
meanings.sent5: The toolsheds of knowledge in his brain were overflowing with new information.
